name: Hell's Depths
description:
Controls:
WASD: Look around
LMB: Interact
RMB: Use extinguisher

Your vessel is unstable, take care of it as best you can. Put out fires, repair leaks, clean the ventilation, and watch your power. Most importantly, be careful of what lurks in the depths.

WARNING!

WEB BUILD MAY BE LAGGY AND/OR GLITCHY, IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED THAT YOU USE A LINUX, WINDOWS, OR MAC BUILD.

Earth recolonisation efforts have been underway, but recent reports from the Cascadian region have suggested possible seismic activity of worrying degrees.

As such, the UPNS Resurrection has been sent to erect a probe at the bottom of an anomalous trench atop a plateau in the Cascadian Subduction Zone, known as "Hell's Depths".

Little is known about "Hell's Depths", apart from that observations have deemed radiation to be a low-level threat, and that possibly, it could harbour marine life.

Satellite imagery has proposed that the trench is at least 1000m deep, and we intend to explore every last metre.
